issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Build fails with system Boost on Ubuntu Trusty 14.04
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4868](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4868). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice for things to work out of the box, but maybe not worth it. I can use vendored Boost for now

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4868?focusedCommentId=17040094) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I think 14.04 is old enough that we don't care about this, especially as we minimized our Boost dependency surface.
